nodes.text: In 29 BBY, Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his Padawan Anakin Skywalker undertook a mission to the BioCruiser for an investigation called by the Galactic Senate. What became a mission became a battle, which saw the BioCruiser damaged in the battle.

In 29 BBY, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker were dispatched by Grand Master Yoda to the BioCruiser for an investigation of the ship and its inhabitants. The two Jedi were taken to the ship and after a couple of days, they met with the leader, Uni. Kenobi instantly recognized him as Kad Chun, someone he briefly knew while a Padawan himself. It was Kad that accused Kenobi of murdering his brother during an incident in the Jedi Temple in 44 BBY.

After the meeting, Kenobi was reunited with his old friends Andra and Den. Den enlisted the aid of the Jedi to investigate suspicious dealings on the ship, and the investigation led them to the quarters of Vox Chun himself. Now with the aid of Garen Muln onboard, the Jedi discovered that Vox was in league with the Offworld Mining Corporation and a tech assistant called Kern, who was in reality a no name called Terrance Chenati, who was sabotaging Jedi ships twelve years before.

Eventually, Offworld attacked the BioCruiser, and the Jedi ran in pursuit of Kern and Vox. Kern tried to flee, shooting Vox dead. Kern escaped, and Skywalker and Muln quickly took the battle to the fighters attacking the ship. Meanwhile, Kenobi and Kad headed for the bridge where they safely landed the ship on Tentrix. Kenobi saved Chun from battle droids, but sustained a wound to his arm.
Landing the ship on Tentrix, the ship underwent repairs. Kern escaped the battle above the planet and both Kenobi and Chun reconciled their long standing hatred.
